p: Agreeing with these facts, the current studied plant species contains as observed in previous investigations luteolin and apigenin flavonoids, which may be the main cause of these observed results. In this study, the decrease in serum TC and serum TG levels in both the C + TL and D + TL groups may have been affected by one or all of the abovementioned biological properties of flavonoids. For that, T. leucocladum improves hyperlipidemia in diabetic condition and it is important to show a protective effect in healthy rats.
